title: Bank-grade security for clinics: what it means (and what to ask)
author: BISTEC Care Team

content.text: Security isn’t about technical jargon. It’s about controlling access, preventing mistakes, and ensuring continuity.
If a vendor cannot answer these clearly, it’s a risk — regardless of how good the UI looks.
